name: 2022 5th International Conference on Mechatronics, Control and Robotics
content: Publicationï¼š The papers submitted to ICMCR 2022 will be peer reviewed by conference committees and IJMERR editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in the International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research, which will be indexed by Scopus (since 2016), CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
